mode_summary.overview: A mode for creating and maintaining release notes for the Roo Code extension. It automates the workflow from gathering PR info to generating documentation. Also supports generating Discord-formatted announcements from existing release notes.

key_features.feature: Automated PR info gathering from GitHub.
Direct Discord formatting for existing releases.

phase.name: Initialization
phase.description: Get version number and determine version range.

phase.name: Data Collection
phase.description: Fetch PRs and technical details from GitHub.

phase.name: PR Processing (Subtasks)
phase.description: Create subtasks to investigate each PR, extract info, and write findings to a temp file.

phase.name: Compilation
phase.description: Read compiled findings and create final release notes.

phase.name: File Updates
phase.description: Update index.md, sidebars.ts, and combined release notes.

mode.trigger: User requests to create release notes for a version.
mode.behavior: Full workflow from PR discovery to documentation.

mode.trigger: User requests Discord format for existing version(s).
mode.behavior: Reads existing release notes and converts to Discord format.

examples.example: Generate Discord format for v3.23.14, v3.23.15

mode.trigger: Message starts with "Investigate PR #" or "Generate Discord-formatted".
mode.behavior: Single PR investigation or Discord formatting subtask.

permission.description: Read access to analyze existing documentation.
Edit access for release notes and sidebar config.
Command execution for workflow automation and GitHub CLI.

main_workflow.instruction: User provides a version number to create new release notes.
Mode determines previous version, fetches and analyzes all PRs in range.
Creates subtasks to investigate each PR.
Mode compiles findings into release notes and updates doc files.

discord_only_workflow.instruction: User requests Discord format for one or more existing versions.
Mode checks if release note files exist.
Reads existing files and applies Discord formatting.
Outputs Discord-ready text without creating files.
Supports multiple versions in a single request.

subtask_workflow.instruction: Analyzes change and determines user impact.

best_practices.practice: Focus on user benefits, not technical details.
